August 23, 1859 from Margaret Coleman to Dr. James H. Minor
Carysburg Aug 23 1859 Docter Minor Dear Sir

theas will in form you that I am yet well and hop theas may find you and all the family the saim as – – – Mr. Minor you will be so kind as to send me one Barl of Poark and one Barrel of flour & one Barrel of Shuger and one piece of white Cloth & 3 kegs of nailes No 16 & 8 & 4 and one Dresspaturn of Blue long & one pice of Calico and one Box of Soape one Spinnin Whial 2 pare of shous No 7 & 2 Grubin Hoes one ax
I has Ris from you as follows 1 Barel of Poark 1 of Shugar one of flour 1 Roll of whit cloth one of calico 8 Paire of Shues the last tim you sent us thim I only got 8 yds of cloth
Nothing more of you Margert Coalmon
August 23, 1859 from Martin Coleman to Dr. James H. Minor
Mr Minor Sir

you will pleas to send me one Barrel of tobaco and Barrel of Pouder one Sack of Salte one Box of Soape one piec of unbleach cotton one of calico 2 Axes, 2 Hoes one piece of Blue Driling one Keg of nales
+ + you Marting Coalman
August 23, 1859 from Alan Coleman to Dr. James H. Minor
Mr Miner
I now send you word what I have got from you 4 pairs of shoues 3 Boalts of cloth one keg of Pouder 2 Bags of Shots one gun

This is all that I have got as yet Now Send me one Brode Ax one Keg of powder & one Bage of Shots & Some Calico and Some Blue Driling and a piece of Kintucky Jins 3 pare of shoues No. 9 one Box of soaps
+ + you Allen Coalman
August 23, 1859 from Washington Coleman to Dr. James H. Minor
Mr Minor

pleas to sen I have Ris one Barrel of Poark 1 Barrel of Flour & one of Shuger and one Sack of Salt one Box of tobacco one Whip saw one pocket Knife 3 pices of cloth one pare of Boots & 2 pair of Shoues one Keg of Pouder one Bage of Shote So you will pleas to send me one poale ax one sack of tobacco and pice of Kintucky Jines one pice of unbleach cotton one Musket one Keg of Pouder one Bag of Shots and one doz whip saw files 3 pare of Shoues No 9. & one piece of Black cotton and some Shoue making tools
My lov to all Washington Coalman
Margaret Coleman, Martin Coleman, Alan Coleman, and Washington Coleman to Dr. Minor 1859 August 23
